text: 200px Con la música en el alma (English language:With the Music in my Soul) is a 1951 Argentine musical film directed by Luis Bayón Herrera and written by Carlos A. Petit. The tango film stars Francisco Canaro (also the producer) and Olga Casares Pearson. ==Cast== *Jaime Andrada *Alberto Arenas *Olga Casares Pearson *Irma Denás *Ramón Garay *Marga Landova *Tito Lusiardo *Andrés Poggio 'Toscanito' *Alberto Rudoy ==References== ==External links== * Category:Argentine films Category:1951 films Category:1951 musical films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Tango films Category:Argentine black- and-white films Category:Films directed by Luis Bayón Herrera Category:1950s dance films
title: With the Music in my Soul
